Serialized Form

  • Package exceptions

    • Class exceptions.ConnectionDataException extends java.lang.Exception implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -6366616777977244265L

      • Serialized Fields

        • dataErrorStr

          java.lang.String dataErrorStr
          Field contains description of an error that is related to ConnectionData
          Note that this field by default contains 
          null string
          which means that ConnectionData was free of errors
          See Also:
          ConnectionDataException#setDataError(ConnectionData)}, MySQLAccess.ConnectionData

  • Package view

    • Class view.AboutWindow extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      6992601172376070322L

    • Class view.MainWindow extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      2740437090361841747L

      • Serialized Fields

        • menuBar

          javax.swing.JMenuBar menuBar
          Menu bar of the main windows, contains all the actions even those not included in main window content area

        • toolBar

          javax.swing.JToolBar toolBar
          ToolBar aggregates buttons triggering most used actions. Contains:
          • zoom combo box
          • group by combo box
          • search text field
          • search button
          to perform operations againt collection view

        • contentPane

          javax.swing.JPanel contentPane
          JPanel for entire JFrame, all elements are going to be placed upon him

        • collectionView

          javax.swing.JPanel collectionView
          JPanel to hold collection view, that will be computeted and presented in user specified form, meaning as:
          • covers composition
          • list of entities

        • bottomPanel

          javax.swing.JPanel bottomPanel
          JPanel containing:
          • dynamic status bar, displaying runtime information
          • constant status bar, displaying database usage statistic
          See Also:
          MainWindow#databaseStatusBar, statusBar

        • userList

          javax.swing.JScrollPane userList
          JScrollPanel containing list of user located at the remote server Users that are friends are marked highlighted, those considered foes are blocked

        • statusBar

          StatusBar statusBar
          StatusBar to print runtime information
          See Also:
          StatusBar

        • actionsPanel

          javax.swing.JPanel actionsPanel
          JPanel to aggregate action buttons
          See Also:
          JPanel

        • publishButton

          javax.swing.JButton publishButton
          JButton to trigger action responsible for publishing local collection and placing it on the remote server

        • groupBy

          java.lang.String groupBy
          Represent choosen category which is used to group collection view againts specified criteria

        • toogleConnection

          javax.swing.JButton toogleConnection
          button to toogle connection by following pattern
          • when disconnected, connection attempt will be performed + user list will be displayed
          • when connection, connection will be lost
          What is important here, that connection is understood as 
           being logged in to program,not database

        • exitButton

          javax.swing.JButton exitButton
          JButton to exit from the application.
          Notice that exit process will trigger database disconnection event

        • newItem

          javax.swing.JButton newItem
          JButton to add new item to the database
          When triggered user is asked what kind of item he would like to add only when Collection view is set to ALL

        • editButton

          javax.swing.JButton editButton
          JButton to edit selected, from Collection view, item

        • aboutMe

          javax.swing.JButton aboutMe
          JButton to show JFrame containing currently loggeed user informations and statistics

  • Package view.utilities

    • Class view.utilities.StatusBar extends javax.swing.JLabel implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      6160242403078374821L
